plot: Juan María is a barber who's looking to be rock star. His dream began to take shape when he was invited to sing at a tango party.
title: Mientras estoy cantando
plot_es: Juan María is a barber who's looking to be rock star. His dream began to take shape when he was invited to sing at a tango party.
plot_en: Juan María is a barber who's looking to be rock star. His dream began to take shape when he was invited to sing at a tango party.
